title: TRM Labs Partners With Aussie Crypto Exchange Swyftx to Combat Scams
description: Blockchain analytics firm TRM Labs has partnered with Australian cryptocurrency exchange Swyftx in an effort to combat scams in the nation.

title: Binance Labs invests $3.15 million in Open Campus for Web3 education revolution
description: Open Campus, backed by Binance Labs and led by Yat Siu, decentralizes education by integrating digital property rights, transforming the global creation of educational content. Open Campus introduces Smart Donations and the Global Educators Fund with $EDU tokens, transparently funding scholarships. In addition, it offers direct ownership to educators through tokenized courses, revolutionizing the creation [...]
